ClassDesc: Constants and helpers for the Calendars table, which contains details for individual calendars. @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#CALLER_IS_SYNCADAPTER_E@ should be set to true and @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#SyncColumns#ACCOUNT_NAME_E@ and @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#SyncColumns#ACCOUNT_TYPE_E@ must be set in the Uri parameters. See @B_android#net#Uri#Builder#appendQueryParameter_E@ for details on adding parameters. Sync adapters have write access to more columns but are restricted to a single account at a time. Calendars are designed to be primarily managed by a sync adapter and inserting new calendars should be done as a sync adapter. For the most part, apps should only update calendars (such as changing the color or display name). If a local calendar is required an app can do so by inserting as a sync adapter and using an @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#SyncColumns#ACCOUNT_TYPE_E@ of
